name: Abalone: Sounds of the Deep
description:
Unity Engine | 1 Player | 2018Control with HTC Vive Controllers. Use key 1-5 to switch scenes.

In this short VR experience you go underwater as a marine biologist. Your goal is to catalogue the speech of the newly discovered Mojili, a group of small creatures that live on the bottom of the ocean. Their speech patterns are refined and you can communicate with them by playing recordings of their speech back to them.

Developed as a school project at the HKU by:
Carl Peters
Robbert Fliek
Luan Stotijn
Jasper Oprel
